item.title: ‘We are not going to stop’: Family still seeking answers 39 years after baby was stolen from crib
item.description: A family in Colorado is still searching for answers after their 7-month-old baby boy was stolen from his crib nearly 40 years ago.

item.title: Sarasota Police get a bang out of training exercise at Bird Key Yacht Club
item.description: SWAT teams blew open multiple doors with explosive devices, resulting in loud noises and smoke.

item.description: Students at the University of South Florida took part in an annual tradition this week.

item.title: Suncoast camp helps kids deal with grief
item.description: Camp Blue Butterfly is designed to help support kids by offering a unique opportunity for kids to connect, heal, and grow.

item.title: Soggy Weather Ahead
item.description: Rain chances start to pick up more tomorrow and through the midweek as a stationary front sits to our north.

item.title: Bradenton man arrested, charged with murder in deadly stabbing of 40-year-old
item.description: Officials say despite life-saving efforts, the 40-year-old stabbing victim was pronounced dead around 7:15 a.m. at Blake Hospital.
